scripts.build:assets: rm -rf assets && vite build --config src/assets/yoastseo/vite.config.js && vite build --config src/assets/yoastseo-translations/vite.config.js && vite build --config src/assets/jed/vite.config.js && vite build --config src/assets/string-pixel-width/vite.config.js
scripts.build:playground: PLAYGROUND=true pnpm run build && pnpm run build:assets
scripts.release: pnpm run build && pnpm run build:assets && bumpp --all --execute "npx zx scripts/pre-release.mjs" && zx scripts/post-release.mjs
